text: Kyle Richardson (born April 7, 1991) is an American professional basketball player for Otsuka Corporation Alphas in Japan. ==References== ==External links== *Portland State Vikings bio *Long Beach State 49ers bio Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Aisin AW Areions Anjo players Category:American expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:American men's basketball players Category:Aomori Wat's players Category:Basketball players from California Category:Earth Friends Tokyo Z players Category:Utsunomiya Brex players Category:Long Beach State Beach men's basketball players Category:Otsuka Corporation Alphas players Category:People from Lakewood, California Category:Portland State Vikings men's basketball players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles County, California
title: Kyle Richardson (basketball)
